Abstract: BENEDETTI-Antonio A.. Age 87, of Summit, New Jersey, Thursday, Dec. 30, 1999. Father of Marie Panzera of Mendham, NJ, and Luddy Benedetti of Summit, NJ. Brother of Mildred Benedetti. Also survived by 4 grandchildren. Mass of the Resurrection will be offered on Monday, January 3, at 8 A.M., at St. Joseph Church, Mendham. Interment St. Charles Cemetery, Farmingdale, N.Y. Friends may call at the Bailey Funeral Home, Inc., 8 Hilltop Road, Mendham, Sunday 2-5PM. Memorial gifts to the American Cancer Society, 669 Littleton Road, Parsippany, New Jersey 07054.
